thread.title: Converse: Extra 25% Off Clearance = Kids’ Shoes Just $15 Shipped (Reg. $35) & More
thread.title_full: Converse: Extra 25% Off Clearance = Kids’ Shoes Just $15 Shipped (Reg. $35) & More

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Converse: Extra 25% Off Clearance = Kids’ Shoes Just $15 Shipped (Reg. $35) & More
text:
Through March 27th, hop on over to Converse.com where they are offering an EXTRA 25% off Clearance Items when you enter the promo code 25MORE at checkout ! If you have a Nike+ account (it’s free to sign up if you’re not yet a member), you’ll score free shipping on every order; otherwise, shipping is $8 or free on orders of $150 or more.
If your kiddos need new shoes, you’ll find various Kids’ Converse Shoes starting at just $19.97 (regularly $35+), so only $14.98 shipped after the code 25MORE .
OR, shop for Women’s Converse Shoes OR Men’s Converse Shoes where prices are as low as $34.97 (regularly $50), so only $26.23 shipped after the code 25MORE .
Nike Also Has Extra 25% Off Clearance! Grab Men’s Tennis Shoes For Only $30 Shipped (Reg. $65)
